alert.note: Alert for Antelope (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 4:28PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Antelope County through 500 PM CDT... At 427 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clearwater, or 6 miles west of Neligh, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Neligh. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
